attributes.review: After reading these lovely reviews there was no hesitation in my mind to download it. Once it finally downloaded after 69 weeks, my phone completely froze. It was stuck, the screen was not touch accesible and I thought my phone was broken. I started to have a breakdown because I thought I would have to obtain a new phone and I’ve already been through 3. After a minute goes by, my room gets dark.. there’s a breeze that was getting stronger and stronger.. everything on my shelves fall off.. the house starts rumbling.. all of the sudden a huge, nauseating figure that had an aggressive orange tone to it bulged out from my screen... yes, OUT! It stood before my tear-filled eyes. I was sitting in the corner of my room pinching myself to see if this was a nightmare, but it sadly was not. I wanted to scream but nothing came out. I was trembling in fear.. I thought my father was scary but this topped it. Before I could say a word, he grabbed a golf club out of his anus and started to attack me with it. I knew I had to fight back. My eyes were scavenging around my room for an object within reach to defend myself with. Then I saw it. With all my strength I threw the Mexican flag at him. He was horrified, but it didn’t completely knock him down to his little knees. What I did next, I had no idea if it was going to work or not. But as they say, “you miss 100% of the shots you don’t take”. I screamed, “HEY SIRI PLAY REGGAETON”. Yes.. yes.. it was working! The orange beast was withering away!! He was clenching his ears while screaming, he couldn’t take it. Since it took a while for his ginormous body to degrade I went and made some popcorn. When I came back he was almost gone, and as his last seconds of being a racist were in light, he squealed, “GRAB EM BY THE P*SSY”... he was now gone. I had defeated him.
attributes.title: Horrid
